title: Defending the city's health
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Communicable diseases
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Immunization
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diseases - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Public health - United States
description: Brings to life the activities of that great army of public health workers who help to make a public health department of a great city work efficiently - on which depends the health of the thousands of citizens who are city dwellers. The death rate from communicable diseases has definitely been reduced since municipal authorities adopted science's recommendations regarding immunization, disinfection, and refuse disposal.
